name: Api Doc
description: Host API documentation for REST services, and facilities design of resource first APIs.

users.description: A user is a top level person interacting with the api doc server.

fields.name: guid
fields.description: Internal unique identifier for this user.

operations.description: Search all users. Results are always paginated. You must specify at least 1 parameter - either a guid, email or token.

parameters.name: guid
parameters.description: User guid.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Find user with this email address. Case in-sensitive. Exact match

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Find the user with this API token. Exact match

organizations.description: An organization is used to group a set of services together.

fields.name: guid
fields.description: Internal unique identifier for this organization.

fields.name: key
fields.description: Used as a unique key in the URL path. Key is automatically derived from the organization name.

operations.description: Search all organizations. Results are always paginated.

parameters.name: guid
parameters.description: Organization guid.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Find organizations with this key. Case in-sensitive. Exact match

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Find organizations with this name. Case in-sensitive. Exact match

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used to paginate. First page of results is 0.

memberships.description: A membership represents a user in a specific role to an organization. Memberships cannot be created directly. Instead you first create a membership request, then that request is either accepted or declined.

fields.name: guid
fields.description: Internal unique identifier for this membership.

fields.name: role
fields.description: The role this user plays for this organization. Typically member or admin.

operations.description: Search all memberships. Results are always paginated.

parameters.name: organization_guid
parameters.description: Find memberships for this organization

parameters.name: user_guid
parameters.description: Find memberships for this user

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: Limit to memberships with this role

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used to paginate. First page of results is 0.

membership_requests.description: A membership request represents a user requesting to join an organization with a specificed role (e.g. as a member or an admin). Membership requests can be reviewed by any current admin of the organization who can either accept or decline the request.

fields.name: guid
fields.description: Internal unique identifier for this membership request.

fields.name: role
fields.description: The requested role for membership to this organization. Typically member or admin.

operations.description: Search all pending membership requests. Results are always paginated.

parameters.name: organization_guid
parameters.description: Find memberships for this organization

parameters.name: user_guid
parameters.description: Find memberships for this user

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: Limit to memberships with this role

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used to paginate. First page of results is 0.

parameters.name: organization_guid
parameters.description: Find memberships for this organization

parameters.name: user_guid
parameters.description: Find memberships for this user

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: Limit to memberships with this role

parameters.name: guid
parameters.description: The membership request guid

parameters.name: guid
parameters.description: The membership request guid

services.description: A service has a name and multiple versions of an API (Interface).

fields.name: guid
fields.description: Internal unique identifier for this service.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The unique name for this service.

fields.name: key
fields.description: Used as a unique key in the URL path. Key is automatically derived from the service name.

operations.description: Search all services. Results are always paginated.

parameters.name: org
parameters.description: Organization key.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Finds the service with this name. Exact match

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Finds the service with this key. Exact match

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used to paginate. First page of results is 0.

operations.description: Deletes this service and all of its associated versions.

parameters.name: org
parameters.description: Organization key.

parameters.name: service
parameters.description: The service key.

versions.description: Represents a unique version of the service.

fields.name: guid
fields.description: Internal unique identifier for this version.

fields.name: version
fields.description: The tag for this version. Can be anything, but if semver style version number is used, we automatically correctly sort by version number to find latest. Otherwise latest version is considered to be the most recently created.

operations.description: Returns summary information about all of the versions for this service, ordered with most recent version first.

parameters.name: org
parameters.description: Organization key.

parameters.name: service
parameters.description: The service key

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used to paginate. First page of results is 0.

operations.description: Returns detailed information about this service version, including the full json description of the version.

parameters.name: org
parameters.description: Organization key.

parameters.name: service
parameters.description: The service key

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The version number. You can specify latest to always get the latest version of this service.
